title: How long until the ice caps are completely melted? - Quora

There is the “settled science” theory; Greenhouse Gas Blankets cause temperatures to rise, Polar ice melts, a tipping point is reached when methane gas is released from melting tundra and the earth fries. It was based on temperatures rising almost 1.5 degrees F between 1980 and 2000; the rise started abruptly in 1980 after 200 years of industrial revolution and burning of hydrocarbons without any rise at all. NOAA charts show this. This theory predicted that Ice at the North Pole would melt in 10 years and polar bears would die, becoming extinct. Actual data shows Arctic Ice had melted significantly before 1922 and increased after 1922 as CO2 increased. This contradicts the theory. Further, the sudden melting after 1980 with no sudden increase in rise rate of CO2 requires a second source of energy which was supplied by magma beneath the eastern Arctic Ocean. One very striking piece of data is the latest satellite photo of the Arctic for April, 2019. Hudson Bay and James Bay as well as the Arctic Ocean are completely frozen over. James Bay is 1/2 the distance to the equator!!! The Greenhouse Gas Theory does not predict this. Our planet has entered a falling temperature-increased ice era. In fact we have entered an ice age where northern areas will be covered with ice and snow and the ocean levels will start to fall from loss of water and cooling temperatures. Study the data - understand what it tells you. FACTS MATTER.
